items.text: Met timeless for first patient for amendment 3 after enrollment had been on hold.
Caugh up on SDV backlog at 2 of 3 sites
SDV backlog caught up at MDACC  and site data entry to be caught
Approval of amendment 3 and addition of 2 new sites (IRB approval at OKC, SIV scheduled for 20 Jan 2014, pending IRB approval at Karmanos)
Amendment 3 dosing is chaning from every 3 weeks to weekly dosing (essentially new protocol)
Increased time for site training during RMV. Backlog of data entry and SDV at one site (resolution plan is in place)•

content.text: If the blind is broken, it would trigger an action by the Bayer team to review why the subject’s blind was broken.
Another example is if data backlog metrics continue to be above the established threshold for more than 2 reporting cycles, Bayer could request weekly updates on Covance action plans.
